message: Hi Bob, thanks for your interest in the product. After careful consideration, I'm offering it to you at $1,100,000. I believe this reflects its true value and the benefits it will bring you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, however, $900,000 is significantly below its market value and the investment I've made. I'm willing to compromise and offer it at $1,050,000. This reflects a fair deal for both of us.
I understand that you've made some compromises, but $1,050,000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $950,000. I believe this is a fair price for both of us.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  However, we're still quite far apart.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,025,000.  This is my final offer, and I believe it represents a fair deal considering the value this product brings.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $1,025,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $975,000, which is the maximum I'm willing to go. I hope we can meet at this price.
